messages.content: Hi, thank you for taking the time to speak with me today, Robert. I'm excited to learn more about Internet Brands and explore how Whatfix can help you achieve your goals. Can you tell me a little bit about what's driving your interest in digital adoption platforms?

Yes, of course. As you know, we're a large enterprise with multiple divisions, and we're struggling to drive innovation and growth in our high-value markets. We're looking for ways to serve our businesses and consumers more efficiently, and we believe a digital adoption platform could be a key enabler in achieving that.

I completely understand. It sounds like you're facing some challenges in terms of scaling and driving innovation across your different divisions. Can you tell me more about what you mean by 'serving businesses and consumers more efficiently'? Are there specific pain points or challenges you're trying to address?

Well, we have multiple applications across our divisions, and it's becoming increasingly difficult to ensure that our employees are adopted to these new applications. We're also finding it challenging to measure the ROI of our digital transformation initiatives. We're looking for a solution that can help us accelerate digital transformation, drive user adoption, and maximize our technology investments.

I see. It sounds like you're looking for a digital adoption platform that can help you drive innovation and growth, while also addressing some of the challenges you're facing around employee adoption and ROI measurement. Have you considered any other solutions or platforms that can help you achieve these goals?

Yes, we've looked at a few other options, including WalkMe and Pendo. While they have some interesting features, we're not convinced that they can provide the level of customization and support we need. We're also concerned about the cost and complexity of implementation.

I understand your concerns. Can you tell me more about what you mean by 'customization and support'? What specific requirements do you have in terms of customization, and how do you envision a digital adoption platform supporting your business needs?

We need a platform that can integrate with our existing software applications, and provide a high level of customization to meet our specific business needs. We're also looking for a platform that can provide robust support and services to ensure a smooth implementation and ongoing success.

I see. It sounds like you're looking for a platform that can provide a high level of flexibility and support. Whatfix is designed to be highly customizable, and we offer a range of services and support options to ensure a smooth implementation and ongoing success. Can you tell me more about your decision-making process and timeline for selecting a digital adoption platform?

We're looking to make a decision within the next 3-6 months. Our CEO, Robert N. Brisco, will be involved in the decision-making process, as well as our parent company, KKR, and owners, Warburg Pincus and Temasek. We're also evaluating the budget for this initiative, but we're expecting it to be in the range of $500,000 to $1 million per year.

Thank you for sharing that information, Robert. It sounds like you have a clear vision for how a digital adoption platform can help drive innovation and growth at Internet Brands. I believe Whatfix can provide the level of customization, support, and ROI that you're looking for. I'd like to schedule a follow-up call to discuss how Whatfix can address your specific pain points and challenges. Would that be okay with you?
Yes, that sounds great. I look forward to speaking with you again and learning more about how Whatfix can help us achieve our goals.

messages.content: Hello everyone, thanks for taking the time to join this demo call today. I'm excited to show you how Whatfix can help Internet Brands drive innovation and growth in high-value markets, ensure employee adoption of new applications, and measure the ROI of digital transformation initiatives. Before we dive in, I just want to confirm that we have the right stakeholders on the call. We have Robert N. Brisco, CEO, and representatives from KKR, Warburg Pincus, and Temasek. Is there anyone else I'm missing?
That's correct, we have all the key stakeholders represented on this call. We're looking forward to seeing how Whatfix can address our pain points.

Great. To start, I'd like to give you a brief overview of our Digital Adoption Platform. This platform is designed to accelerate digital transformation, drive user adoption, and maximize technology investments. We've seen significant success with similar companies in the past, and I believe we can do the same for Internet Brands.

One of the key features of our platform is our No-Code Editor. This editor allows us to create in-app guidance on any application that looks 100% native. We've found that this feature is particularly useful for ensuring seamless user experience and driving adoption of new applications.
That sounds interesting. Can you show us how that works?

Absolutely. Let me just share my screen real quick. (shares screen) Okay, so here you can see our No-Code Editor in action. We can create customized in-app guidance for any application, and it's all done without requiring any coding expertise.

Another key feature of our platform is our Product Analytics. This feature allows us to measure the ROI of digital transformation initiatives and track user adoption. We've found that this feature is particularly useful for companies that are struggling to measure the impact of their digital transformation initiatives.
We're concerned about the cost and complexity of implementation. Can you tell us more about how Whatfix addresses these concerns?

I completely understand your concerns. Whatfix is designed to be highly customizable, and we offer a range of services and support options to ensure a smooth implementation and ongoing success. We've worked with many companies in the past who have had similar concerns, and we've been able to provide them with a successful implementation that meets their needs.

In fact, I'd like to share a success story with you. One of our customers, a large software company, was able to reduce their implementation time by 50% using our platform. They were also able to increase their user adoption rates by 20%.
That's impressive. Can you tell us more about how Whatfix can support our specific business needs?

Absolutely. We offer a high level of customization options to support specific business needs. We can work with you to understand your unique requirements and provide a customized solution that meets your needs. We can also provide personalized support to ensure that you're getting the most out of our platform.

Before we wrap up, I just want to clarify that we'll be providing a customized demo assets package to you after this call. This package will include a presentation, videos, and other supporting documents that will help you understand how Whatfix can address your specific pain points.

We're excited about the opportunity to work with Internet Brands and address your specific pain points. We believe that our Digital Adoption Platform can provide significant value to your organization. What are your thoughts on next steps?
We're interested in moving forward. Can you provide us with a customized proposal that outlines the scope of work, timeline, and pricing?
Absolutely. We'll provide you with a customized proposal within the next 3-5 business days. We're looking forward to the opportunity to work with Internet Brands and help you achieve your goals.

messages.content: Hello, Robert, KKR Representative, and Warburg Pincus Representative. Thank you for taking the time to discuss the pricing for our digital adoption platform. I'm excited to walk you through our pricing models and how they can support your business needs.
Thank you for having us. We're interested in understanding how your pricing works and how it can fit within our budget constraints.

Absolutely, Robert. We have three pricing models that I'd like to discuss with you. Our Flat Fee + User License Fees model is our most popular option. It's based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees. We can customize this plan to fit your specific business needs.
That sounds interesting. Can you tell us more about the flat fee and user license fees? How do they work?

The flat fee is a one-time payment for each application you'd like to implement our platform on. The user license fees are then based on the number of users who will be utilizing the platform. We can provide you with a custom quote based on your specific requirements.
I see. What's the typical range for the flat fee and user license fees?

The flat fee typically ranges from $5,000 to $20,000 per application, depending on the complexity of the implementation. The user license fees range from $10 to $50 per user, per month. However, we can provide a discount for larger enterprise implementations.
I see. We're looking to implement your platform on multiple applications, and we expect to have around 5,000 users. Can you provide us with a custom quote?

I'd be happy to provide you with a custom quote. Based on your requirements, I estimate the total cost to be around $750,000 per year. However, we can offer a discount for a multi-year commitment. Would you like me to provide more details on the discount structure?
That's a bit higher than we were expecting. Do you have any flexibility in the pricing?

I understand your concerns, and I'm happy to work with you to find a solution that fits within your budget constraints. We can offer a phased implementation approach, which can help reduce the upfront costs. Additionally, we can provide a ROI analysis to demonstrate the value our platform can bring to your business.
That sounds like a good approach. What kind of ROI can we expect from your platform?

Our platform has been shown to increase user adoption rates by up to 20% and reduce implementation time by up to 50%. One of our customers, a large software company, was able to achieve a ROI of 300% within the first year of implementation.
I'm impressed with the ROI potential. What's the next step in the process?

I'd like to provide you with a custom proposal outlining the details of our pricing model and implementation plan. We can also schedule a follow-up call to discuss any further questions or concerns you may have. Would that work for you?
Yes, that works for us. We're looking to make a decision within the next 3-6 months, so please ensure the proposal is sent over within the next week.
I'll ensure the proposal is sent over within the next week. Thank you for your time today, and I look forward to the opportunity to work with you.

concerns: pricing is a bit higher than we were expecting
budget_constraints: a bit higher than we were expecting
timelines_to_close: make a decision within the next 3-6 months

ROI_calculators: 300% ROI within the first year of implementation

messages.content: Hi Robert, KKR Representative, and Warburg Pincus Representative, it's great to be speaking with all of you again. I understand that we've had a thorough discussion on our product and its benefits, and I'm excited to move forward with the negotiation process. Can you please confirm that you're all comfortable with the features and functionalities we've discussed, and we can focus on the final terms of the agreement?

Yes, we're comfortable with the product features, but we do have some concerns about the pricing. It's a bit higher than we were expecting. Can you walk us through the pricing structure again and see if there's any room for negotiation?

I completely understand your concerns, Robert. Our pricing model is based on a flat fee plus user license fees. However, we do offer customization options and discounts for larger enterprise implementations. We've also had success with phased implementation approaches, which can help with the ROI and implementation time. Would you like me to run some numbers and provide a customized quote based on your specific needs?

That sounds interesting. We're looking to make a decision within the next 3-6 months, and we need to ensure that the pricing fits within our budget constraints. Can you provide a ROI analysis to help us justify the investment?

Absolutely, KKR Representative. We've developed a ROI calculator that can help you quantify the benefits of our platform. Based on our historical case studies, we've seen an average ROI of 300% within the first year of implementation. I can provide you with a customized ROI analysis tailored to your specific needs and expectations.
We're also concerned about the implementation time and complexity. Can you provide more information on your implementation services and support options?

Our implementation services are designed to ensure a smooth and successful rollout of our platform. We offer a range of services, including project management, training, and support. We've had success with similar companies in the past, and I can provide you with a case study to demonstrate our capabilities. In terms of complexity, our No-Code Editor allows for seamless integration with your existing applications, and our Product Analytics provide real-time insights to measure the ROI of your digital transformation initiatives.
That sounds reassuring. In terms of contract terms, we typically require a 3-year commitment. Can you accommodate that and provide a discount for the multi-year commitment?

We can certainly accommodate a 3-year commitment, Robert. And as a matter of fact, we do offer discounts for multi-year commitments. I can provide you with a customized proposal that includes a 10% discount for the 3-year commitment. Additionally, we can provide a phased implementation approach to help you achieve your ROI goals.
That sounds like a good compromise. What kind of support and resources will be available to us during the implementation process?

We'll provide a dedicated project manager and a team of experts to ensure a successful implementation. We'll also provide access to our knowledge base, online training, and ongoing support to ensure that you're getting the most out of our platform. And, as I mentioned earlier, we'll provide a customized ROI analysis to help you measure the success of your digital transformation initiatives.
I think we've covered all our concerns. What's the next step in the process, and when can we expect to receive the customized proposal?

I'll provide the customized proposal within the next 48 hours. Once you've reviewed it, we can schedule a follow-up call to discuss any further questions or concerns you may have. My goal is to ensure that you're completely satisfied with our product and services, and that we're meeting your needs and expectations. I'm confident that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
